scenes.text: We are Cardiff University's American Football club, the Cobras. The Cobras have the incredible privilege of competing at the highest level of university sports, participating in thrilling away day events drawing thousands of spectators, including our Welsh Varsity match. Now, it's your chance to be a part of one of the fastest-growing sports in the UK, at its highest level, regardless of your background or prior American Football experience.

We have weekly training sessions on Tuesdays and Thursdays. We also have Sunday sessions on BYE weeks, as well as this we have weekly online classroom sessions. 

Our fixtures take place on Sundays and the occational Saturday. 

Our full training schedule and details are on our webpage and social media.
We have two different types of memberships for beginners vs advanced members. Beginner membership is £100 whereas advanced membership is £80.

At the heart of the Cardiff Cobras is our sense of community. Our weekly social events are renowned as some of the best at Cardiff University. Build lasting friendships beyond the field in fantastic social environments, and connect with fellow students from across the university at our monthly joint socials. Plus, enjoy exclusive discounts at Cardiff's finest pubs and bars as a Cardiff Cobra, with reduced ticket prices and drink specials.
